attributes.action: Match public sector pay rises with the rate at which MPs pay rises are increased
attributes.additional_details:
BBC news - Unions criticise 1% pay rise for public sector workers
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-39416869
attributes.background: After reading a news story today I felt it wrong that MP's are getting a 1.4% pay rise. This is while public sector employees have been approved a rise of 1%.
